text:
- CONVERSATIONS ABROAD -
CLOSING FOR TAPE # 3 — INTERVIEW WITH ITALIAN HOSTESS IN CUNEO, ITALY
THIS HAS BEEN THE THIRD IN A SERIES OF BROADCASTS ENTITLED.
“CONVERSATIONS ABROAD** FEATURING TOUR INTERNATIONAL HOSTESS....
MISS DORIS TROCCHI (TRO»-KE) AND HER VISITS TO STUDENT CENTERS IN FRANCE,
ITALY AND YUGOSLAVIA. THE GROUP VISITING IN CUNEQ, (KUN'-EH-O) ITALY,
HEARD ON TODAY*S BROADCAST, WERE PARTICIPATING IN A PROGRAM KNOWN AS
“EXPERII\£ENT IN INTERNATIONAL LIVING**, WHICH OBSERVES ITS 25TH ANNIVERSARY
THIS YEAR. ALL INQUIRIES REGARDING THIS PROGRAM SHOULD BE ADDRESSED
DIRECTLY TO THE EXPERIMENT IN INTERNATIONAL LIVING, PUTNEY, VERMONT.
THE NEXT IN THIS SERIES WILL FEATURE AN INTERVIEW WITH MEMBERS OF A
STUDENT BAND AT THE UNIVERSITY OF LJUBLIANA, (LUB-YHA*-NA) YUGOSLAVIA.
RECORDED AT A SPECIAL TELEVISION EXPOSITION IN THAT CITY.
mm
